name: Rio Cuale / Jungle Trek Rhino & Canopy Combo
description: Life is short so use your time wisely when you’re on vacation. We want you to enjoy the best of Vallarta, that’s why we offer the brand new COMBO Tour! Conveniently take the Rhino tour to the Canopy tour, so you can enjoy both adventures in one day! On our River Cuale / Jungle Trek Rhino & River Canopy Combo tour, you’ll get it all from tequila samples, a jungle bar, waterfalls, off-road fun, and now, even the exhilarating freedom of riding steel cable zip lines over the jungle….this will be a day you’ll never forget!
